messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package.
What does the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package include?
Can you tell me about the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus offer?
What are the benefits of the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package?
The 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package offers 20GB of internet, including 10GB available from 1AM to 9AM, for Rs. 240, including taxes. This package is valid for 7 days from the date of subscription.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on how to subscribe to the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package.
How can I subscribe to the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package?
What's the code to activate the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus offer?
Tell me how to get the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package.
You can subscribe to the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package by dialing *225# from your Telenor number.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for issues related to package resources.
What happens if I use up my 4G Weekly Ultra Plus data before the week is over?
If my 4G Weekly Ultra Plus data runs out early, what will I be charged?
If you use up all the data in your 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package before the 7 days are up, you will be charged Rs 1 per MB until the package expires.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing details on package renewals.
Does the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package renew automatically?
Will my 4G Weekly Ultra Plus automatically renew?
No, the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package does not renew automatically. You must manually subscribe again once it expires to continue using the services.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information on multiple subscriptions.
Can I subscribe to the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package more than once in a week?
Is it possible to activate the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package multiple times within its validity period?

Yes, you can subscribe to the 4G Weekly Ultra Plus package multiple times within the 7-day validity period. However, the resources and their validity from each subscription are maintained separately and do not combine.
